item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:39, topic:432867”]Say I download a free leech torrent, would it be possible to seed them on my home pc and download them directly from my home pc to my vps running rtorrent?

Basically just transfer between them to get my ratio up :)[/quote]
of course, just don’t change the file integrity whilst transfering (so it maintains the same hash)

Read full topic

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

BloodRayne:

I noticed in their rules it states that sharing .torrent files will automatically alert their system, do I have to do anything special to prevent this from happening if I’m seeding from a vps?

in the event you get disabled you can head over to their irc network to get unbanned. i doubt you would though as a lot of people use shared seedboxes.

my morbid angel albums seeded quite nicely

Read full topic

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

BloodRayne:

I noticed in their rules it states that sharing .torrent files will automatically alert their system, do I have to do anything special to prevent this from happening if I’m seeding from a vps?

They mean uploading a .torrent file to another site that you initially grabbed from them. It will ban you automatically because it has a unique passkey that belongs to you embedded in it.

Read full topic

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

what.cd

By the way, that is almost all albums by Tupac, which explains why I got some ratio. If you need some ratio, I’d download some mainstream music and then just seed that.

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:33, topic:432867”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=535574.msg3921820#msg3921820 date=1329785661]

How are you meant to keep a decent ratio when everyone is seeding everything Downloaded an album and left it up all day/night with 0kb transferred

I have the same problem, especially with the music I downloaded. I initially downloaded 4 albums that totaled a few hundred megabytes, and seeded them 24/7 for months before I had a 2.2 or something ratio before downloading a few more which have now been seeding for over a month and have a 0.0 ratio. I’m just leaving them all seeding hoping someone will grab one of them one day. I don’t have the time to upload something new.
[/quote]
As stated you can grab hot torrents/freeleech torrents.[/quote]
I’ve never even looked, I doubt I would be remotely interested in them. I can just stay at 100% seeded all the time with the torrents I do like.

Read full topic

I’m just leaving them all seeding hoping someone will grab one of them one day. I don’t have the time to upload something new.[/quote]
As stated you can grab hot torrents/freeleech torrents.

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

http://bigsb.net/ - Watch your capacity though, if you go over, they don’t have monitoring and then they’ll ask you to pay. I went over by 300% (~1TB space / 300GB allowed) and they messaged me about it, but I didn’t respond and then got my seedbox deleted, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

Arabic music, what the fuck.

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:19, topic:432867”]How are you meant to keep a decent ratio when everyone is seeding everything Downloaded an album and left it up all day/night with 0kb transferred :P[/quote]Just keep doing that… You’ll get ratio eventually. Once you have a decent ratio, then start downloading more and more.

You could also buy a seedbox. I got my ratio up with What.CD because I started with a seedbox and just left it to seed all day and night.

Read full topic

How are you meant to keep a decent ratio when everyone is seeding everything Downloaded an album and left it up all day/night with 0kb transferred

item.title: What.cd invite who wants
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

BloodRayne:

How are you meant to keep a decent ratio when everyone is seeding everything Downloaded an album and left it up all day/night with 0kb transferred

what.cd is notorious for being difficult to seed on. the best ways to get your ratio up are having a seedbox ready for when freeleeches come around, filling requests, or uploading new content.

Read full topic
